Description:
Complete all vehicle body panel & work up to the standard of the manufacturer
Complete any additional Fabrication, Modifications work in agreed timescales to ensure client satisfaction
Repairs damage to metal body work on vehicles and forms replacement vehicle panels
Remove damaged panels and parts or removes upholstery and accessories to gain access
Straighten damaged vehicles and parts using mechanical and hydraulic equipment
Repairs panels by welding on new sections
Inform the Supervisor for any additional work required other than as mentioned on the job card based on the condition of the fleetSkills
Skills:
Good understanding of English
Able to work independently
Able to replace parts such as Bumpers, Mirrors, Window lifters, Hinges, car seats etc.
Knowledge of replacing windshields is a plus
Able to use MIG, spot and oxy weld; will use a hammer & dolly flipper to press metal
Aluminum repair & welding experience is a plus
